mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM users u JOIN (SELECT * FROM user_info i JOIN departments d ON i.dept_no = d.dept_no) a ON u.emp_no = a.emp_no

SELECT a.emp_no, a.name, a.rank, a.dept_no, a.dept_name, u.id, u.email, u.phone, u.emp_grade, u.emp_date, u.emp_status FROM users u JOIN (SELECT i.emp_no, i.name, i.rank, i.dept_no, d.dept_name FROM user_info i JOIN departments d ON i.dept_no = d.dept_no) a ON u.emp_no = a.emp_no WHERE u.id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM (select a.emp_no, a.name, a.rank, a.pno, a.pinfo_date, a.dept_no, a.dept_name, b.id from (select i.emp_no, i.name, i.rank, i.pno, i.pinfo_date, i.dept_no, d.dept_name from user_info i left join departments d on i.dept_no = d.dept_no) a left join users b on a.emp_no = b.emp_no
AND a.emp_no LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'
AND a.name LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'
AND a.dept_name LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'
order by a.emp_no desc ) t )
WHERE rn >= (#{cri.page}-1) * #{cri.perPageNum} +1 AND rn <= #{cri.page} * #{cri.perPageNum}

SELECT count(*) from (select i.emp_no, i.name, i.rank, i.pno, i.pinfo_date, i.dept_no, d.dept_name from user_info i left join departments d on i.dept_no = d.dept_no) a left join users b on a.emp_no = b.emp_no
AND a.emp_no LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'
AND a.name LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'
AND a.dept_name LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ( select dept_no, dept_name, dept_head, dept_date, dept_auth from departments
AND dept_name LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'
AND dept_head LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'
order by dept_date desc ) t )
WHERE rn >= (#{cri.page}-1) * #{cri.perPageNum} +1 AND rn <= #{cri.page} * #{cri.perPageNum}

SELECT count(*) from departments
AND dept_name LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'
AND dept_head LIKE '%${cri.keyword}%'

select d.dept_name, count(id) as dept_cnt from departments d left join (select i.name, i.dept_no, i.rank, u.emp_no, u.id, u.phone, u.emp_status from user_info i join users u on i.emp_no = u.emp_no where u.emp_status = 'O') a on d.dept_no = a.dept_no group by d.dept_name

select d.dept_no, d.dept_name, d.dept_head, d.dept_date, d.dept_auth, a.rank, a.emp_no, a.id, a.phone, a.name from departments d left join (select i.name, i.dept_no, i.rank, u.emp_no, u.id, u.phone, u.emp_status from user_info i join users u on i.emp_no = u.emp_no where u.emp_status = 'O') a on d.dept_no = a.dept_no where d.dept_no = #{deptNo} order by a.emp_no
select u.id, u.emp_no, i.dept_no, i.name, i.rank from users u join user_info i on u.emp_no = i.emp_no where i.dept_no is null and u.emp_status = 'O'
mapper.update: update user_info set dept_no = #{deptNo} where emp_no = #{empNo}
update user_info set dept_no = null where emp_no = #{empNo}
update user_info set dept_no = null where dept_no = #{deptNo}
mapper.select: select a.code, a.code_name, m.group_code from public_code_auth a join public_code_master m on a.group_code = m.group_code where m.group_code = 'B'
mapper.insert: insert into departments(dept_no, dept_name, dept_date, dept_auth) values(dept_seq.nextval, #{deptName}, sysdate, #{deptAuth})
mapper.update: update departments set dept_head = null where dept_no = #{deptNo}
